title: Joan's Descent Into Alzheimer's
description: When her husband drops dead, Joan is left unable to cope in a world she no longer understands. Her late husband had hidden the truth, Joan has Alzheimer's disease. As Joan's mind continues to unravel, family relationships are put to the test. When Joan is abused by those entrusted with her care, the question arises; is anyone prepared to reveal the truth of what really goes on behind closed doors?
author: Jill Stoking
